intro: Elatostema lihengianum, commonly known as the Li Heng stonecrop, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Urticaceae, which includes nettles and related species. The plant is characterized by its small, succulent leaves and clusters of tiny, white flowers. It typically grows in rocky or shaded environments, showcasing its adaptability to harsh conditions. Its unique morphology and habitat make it an interesting subject for botanical study.
